topic: Has anyone ever downloaded the “rtcontrib Lesson” document on Radiance-online?
body:
The "rtcontrib Lesson" document was created by by Dr Axel Jacobs,which was ever posted on radiance-online.However,for some reason,it has been removed.So I can not download it.Has anyone ever downloaded it and would you be so kind to send me a copy of it? It is very important to me.


Thx!
